note:
Herder of cats. Teller of tales. Wrangler of truths.

Former systems editor, (Spartanburg, SC) Herald-Journal; former operations manager of the The Independent Florida Alligator (Gainesville, FL); freelance magazine writer published in The Floridian (former Sunday magazine of the St. Petersburg Times) Florida Trend, Florida Sportsman, Florida Audubon.

Currently working to start a local media nonprofit in Spartanburg, SC.

I mute posts that make accusations without links to evidence.
